description: Structured information describing a version of a brain atlas.

alias._instruction: Enter an user-defined identifier, often a short name, of this brain atlas version.

alternativeVersionOf._instruction: Add one or several alternative version(s) of this brain atlas versions.

annotationSet._instruction: Add one or several annotation(s) included in this brain atlas version.

coordinateSpace._instruction: Add the coordinate space this brain atlas version exists in.

fullName._instruction: Enter a descriptive name of this brain atlas version.

newVersionOf._instruction: Add the earlier brain atlas version this item is a new version of.

referenceDataset._instruction: Add the reference dataset for this brain atlas version.

relatedOntology._instruction: Enter the identifier (IRI) of the related ontological term that best describes this brain atlas version.

releaseDate._instruction: Enter the date of first broadcast/publication/release of this brain atlas version.

terminology._instruction: Add the terminology of this brain atlas version.

versionIdentifier._instruction: Enter the version identifier of this brain atlas version.

versionInnovation._instruction: Enter a short description of the novelties/peculiarities of this brain atlas version.
